item.title: Chris Fournier. American Made. Powered by Coffee.
item.description: I'm a seasoned user experience designer who works in code and Git. I specialize in UX and UI design, responsive web design, and design systems, and I have experience solving problems in cross-functional settings for a wide range of B2B and B2C products, platforms, and services for retail, e-commerce, fintech, and more.
